content: follow this crochet pattern to make a giant hammerhead shark amigurumi that can also double as a pillow he s so soft and cuddly you ll want to take him everywhere -------------------------- you will receive -------------------------- 1 pdf digital download file for giant hammerhead shark amigurumi crochet pattern instant download as soon as payment clears ravelry s system written in english and u s crochet terms ---------------- yarn used ---------------- 100% polyester chenille / blanket yarn super bulky weight yarn #6 ------------------------------------- finished measurements ------------------------------------- 29 long 31 circumference ----------------- skill level ----------------- intermediate ---------- notes ---------- ~gauge is included in this pattern ~this pattern has been checked for accuracy although this has been tested please note that small errors can still slip by i am happy to assist if you need any help ~this is a free pattern on my blog but you can also purchase this listing for the ad-free downloadable pdf version ----------------------- downloading ----------------------- ~download instructions~ go to my notebook and find the pattern image for this purchase and a download link will accompany it i cannot email patterns to you ------------------------ where to print ------------------------ ~ home printer ~ local copy store -
